list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make musical sounds with the voice, especially words with a set tune.
make a high-pitched whistling or buzzing sound.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the kettle was beginning to sing

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: act as an informer to the police.
recount or celebrate in a work of literature, especially poetry.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: poetry should sing the strangeness and variety of the human race
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thơ nên hát sự kỳ lạ và sự đa dạng của loài người

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act or spell of singing.
